description: DevOps Lead allocated 17.5 estimated hours (adjusted 26.5) against 15% capacity (approx 12-15 hours), creating immediate bottleneck.
mitigation_strategy: Reassign TASK-INFRA-003 (CI/CD) to Backend Lead. Increase DevOps allocation to 30% for Sprint 1.

description: Mobile Lead task for Background Location (TASK-MOB-002) is estimated at 14.3h but has high complexity/risk factor, likely exceeding 22h.
mitigation_strategy: Start prototyping in Sprint 1 (utilizing slack time) instead of waiting for Sprint 2.
contingency_plan: Descend scope to foreground-only tracking for MVP
